sense.gloss: omitting crucial steps, cutting corners, skimping
tenuki, making a move which is not a direct counter to one's opponent's last move

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑手抜↑↓|てぬ↓き|をしない↑人↑↓ひと↓だ。
sdata.e: He is a person who never cuts corners.

sdata.j: いつも↑手抜↑↓|てぬ↓き|↑料理↑↓りょうり↓ばっかりだから、↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑本格↑↓ほんかく↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑料理↑↓りょうり↓を↑作↑↓つく↓ろうかな。
sdata.e: I always make simple recipes, but today I think I want to cook for real.

sdata.j: ↑手抜↑↓|てぬ↓き|↑料理↑↓りょうり↓なら、↑得意↑↓とくい↓よ。
sdata.e: Simple cooking is my strong point.

sdata.j: ↑手抜↑↓|てぬ↓き|↑料理↑↓りょうり↓なら、↑得意↑↓とくい↓よ。
sdata.e: I'm good at cooking simple things.

sdata.j: ↑手抜↑↓|てぬ↓き|↑料理↑↓りょうり↓なら、↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑任↑↓まか↓せて！
sdata.e: If you are looking for easy cooking, leave it to me!

sdata.j: ↑手抜↑↓|てぬ↓き|↑料理↑↓りょうり↓なら、↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑任↑↓まか↓せて！
sdata.e: If you are looking for simple cooking, leave it to me!
